articles.description: Brazil withdraw Manchester United winger Antony from their squad following allegations of abuse by his former girlfriend.
articles.title: Brazil drop Man Utd's Antony after abuse claims

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper has his career-best run at a Grand Slam ended by Russian eighth seed Andrey Rublev in the US Open fourth round.
articles.title: Draper's encouraging US Open run ended by Rublev

articles.description: Jack Grealish and Trent Alexander-Arnold withdraw from the England squad for upcoming games against Ukraine and Scotland because of injury.
articles.title: Grealish and Alexander-Arnold out of England squad

articles.description: Lock Bastien Chalureau denies accusations he is a racist after being called up as injury cover in France's World Cup squad.
articles.title: France lock Chalureau says he is 'not a racist'

articles.description: Tottenham duo Tanguy Ndombele and Davinson Sanchez both leave the Premier League club to join Turkish champions Galatasaray.
articles.title: Tottenham duo Ndombele and Sanchez join Galatasaray

articles.description: Third seed Jessica Pegula leaves the court in tears after a frustrating US Open fourth-round defeat by Madison Keys.
articles.title: Pegula leaves court in tears after Keys loss

articles.description: Match of the Day 2's Jermaine Jenas and Stephen Warnock discuss Manchester United's set-piece problem which led to Declan Rice's late goal.
articles.title: How Rice punished 'criminal' Man Utd error

articles.description: Spain's men's players condemn the "unacceptable behaviour" of national federation president Luis Rubiales.
articles.title: Spain men's players condemn Rubiales behaviour

articles.description: Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz cruises into the US Open quarter-finals with a straight-set win over Matteo Arnaldi.
articles.title: Defending champion Alcaraz into US Open last eight

articles.description: In-game audio of match officials and VAR teams to be shown on TV programme featuring Howard Webb and Michael Owen.
articles.title: Webb to front show explaining refereeing decisions
